sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_466ad6f4c30ab2107779554d05013157
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Before Insert-incident lite </name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	if(!current.short_description){
		current.short_description = (current.category || 'general') + 'issue reported';
	}
	if(!current.impact) current.impact = 3;
	if(!current.urgency) current.urgency =3;
	// Add your code here
	var pc = new x_<ns>_itsm_incident.lite.priorityCalc();
	pc.recalcFor(current);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-23 22:17:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>466ad6f4c30ab2107779554d05013157</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Before Insert-incident lite </sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Incident_Lite" source="x_884051_inciden_0">219ca168c30632107779554d050131df</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Incident_Lite">219ca168c30632107779554d050131df</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_466ad6f4c30ab2107779554d05013157</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-23 22:29:02</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=466ad6f4c30ab2107779554d05013157"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_8348ac29c30232107779554d050131fe
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>after insert </name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
	try{
    var grp = new GlideRecord('x_<ns>_itsm_incident_lite_u_assignment_matrix');
    grp.addQuery('u_category', current.category);
    grp.addQuery('u_priority', current.priority);
    grp.query();
    if (grp.next()) {
        current.assignment_group = grp.u_group;

        var rota = new GlideRecord('x_<ns>_itsm_incident_lite_u_oncall_rota');
        rota.addQuery('u_group', grp.u_group);
        rota.orderBy('u_sequence');
        rota.query();
        if (rota.next()) {
            current.assigned_to = rota.u_user;
        }
        current.update();
    }
	}catch(e){
        gs.error('Auto-assign failed:', +e);
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-25 22:00:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8348ac29c30232107779554d050131fe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>after insert </sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Incident_Lite" source="x_884051_inciden_0">219ca168c30632107779554d050131df</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Incident_Lite">219ca168c30632107779554d050131df</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8348ac29c30232107779554d050131fe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-25 22:25:51</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8348ac29c30232107779554d050131fe"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_14e17465c30232107779554d0501312f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Before_update</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	if(current.impact.changes()|| current.urgency.changes()){
		var pc = new x_<ns>_itsm_incident_lite.PriorityCalc();
		pc.recalcFor(current);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-25 22:36:22</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>14e17465c30232107779554d0501312f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Before_update</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Incident_Lite" source="x_884051_inciden_0">219ca168c30632107779554d050131df</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Incident_Lite">219ca168c30632107779554d050131df</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_14e17465c30232107779554d0501312f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-25 22:58:12</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=14e17465c30232107779554d0501312f"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_d72a997cc302b2107779554d050131ac
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_884051_inciden_0.PriorityCalc</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>PriorityCalc</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var PriorityCalc = Class.create();
PriorityCalc.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    map: function(impact, urgency) {
        var matrix = {
            '1_1': 1,
            '1_2': 2,
            '1_3': 3,
            '2_1': 2,
            '2_2': 3,
            '2_3': 4,
            '3_1': 3,
            '3_2': 4,
            '3_3': 5
        };
		var key = impact + '_' + urgency;
		return matrix[key] || 3;
    },
	recalcFor: function(inc){
		var impact = parseInt(inc.impact,10) || 3;
		var urgency = parseInt(inc.urgency,10) || 3;
		inc.priority = this.map(impact, urgency);
	},

    type: 'PriorityCalc'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-23 17:46:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>d72a997cc302b2107779554d050131ac</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PriorityCalc</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Incident_Lite" source="x_884051_inciden_0">219ca168c30632107779554d050131df</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Incident_Lite">219ca168c30632107779554d050131df</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d72a997cc302b2107779554d050131ac</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-23 22:28:47</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
